title: Evaluate to console
body:
This feature would add an "Evaluate in console" to the DOM tree context menu that would send the selected element to the console (same as console.log(<element>).

Proposed Design
- New context menu item "&Evaluate in console" to be enabled for any markup node in the DOM tree in the DOM Explorer.
- The command will decode the image (based on the media type supplied in the URI) to a bitmap that can be copied to the clipboard
